definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

pinyin: gu3 ji3 zhui1 dong4 wu4 xue2
yuan2 kou3 gang1 ji3 zhui1 dong4 wu4

sentences.english: The heart is one of first organs to form during organogenesis in the vertebrate.
sentences.chinese: 心臟是脊椎動物器官發生過程中最早形成的器官之一。

sentences.english: This is the web page of Invertebrate Systematics.
sentences.chinese: 這是無脊椎動物系統分類學的網頁。

sentences.english: There aremore than a thousand sea anemone species.
sentences.chinese: 海葵是無脊椎動物，有一千多個品種。

sentences.english: This is the first documented case of a plant living in partnership, or symbiosis, with a vertebrate.
sentences.chinese: 這是首個被記錄在案的植物與脊椎動物共生的例子。

sentences.english: The vertebrate brain is the most complex example of a modular system.
sentences.chinese: 脊椎動物的大腦正是這樣的複雜功能模塊。

sentences.english: There are otolithic organs in the inner ear of vertebrates.
sentences.chinese: 脊椎動物的內耳中存在耳石器官。

sentences.english: The development of the backboned animals is one of the most fascinating parts of the story of evolution .
sentences.chinese: 脊椎動物的發育是進化史中最吸引人的一部分。

sentences.english: No squirrels are known to hunt vertebrates, or even scavenge meat.
sentences.chinese: 沒有發現有松鼠獵取脊椎動物，或者以肉爲食。

sentences.english: Bones are rigid organs that form part of the endoskeleton of vertebrates.
sentences.chinese: 骨爲堅硬的器官，爲脊椎動物內骨骼的一部分。

sentences.english: The heart is one of first structures to form during organogenesis invertebrate .
sentences.chinese: 心臟是脊椎動物器官發生過程中最早形成的結構之一。

sentences.english: Half of all invertebrate species live in tropical rain forests.
sentences.chinese: 一半的無脊椎動物物種生活在熱帶雨林中。

sentences.english: Giant tortoises can live for up to 150 years and are the longest living vertebrate animals.
sentences.chinese: 大烏龜可以活150年，是脊椎動物中壽命最長的。

sentences.english: Japanese Lamprey is one of the most primitive extant vertebrate.
sentences.chinese: 日本七鰓鰻是現存最原始而特化的脊椎動物之一。

sentences.english: The spleen of certain vertebrate animals, such as cows or pigs.
sentences.chinese: 脾臟某些脊椎動物的脾臟，如牛或豬的。

sentences.english: The heart is one of first structures to form during organogenesis in the vertebrate.
sentences.chinese: 心臟是脊椎動物器官發生過程中最早形成的結構之一。

sentences.english: A form of virgin birth has been found in wild vertebrates for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 野生脊椎動物界首次發現單性生殖案例。

definition: mammals/also written 哺乳動物|哺乳动物
to hunt and kill (an animal or fish)
fishing and hunting/fig. to loot/to plunder
(bird species of China) red-crowned crane (Grus japonensis)
